note: Hacker, Maker, Blogger, Developer, Teacher, Public Interest Technologist @DataMeet & CTO @Peppo. I blog at ThejeshGN.com and this is my social microblog. Everything is Personal. Bangalore/India. +05:30, IST. He/His. Email.

content.html: "Ardern said you cannot and should not lead a country unless you have a 'full tank, plus a bit in reserve for those unexpected challenges'. Male leaders don‚Äôt think about whether or not their tanks are full. So many men running countries today are fuelled by toxic fumes, their tanks empty of any empathy or ability to better the lives of their country‚Äôs citizenry."
content.value: "Ardern said you cannot and should not lead a country unless you have a 'full tank, plus a bit in reserve for those unexpected challenges'. Male leaders don‚Äôt think about whether or not their tanks are full. So many men running countries today are fuelled by toxic fumes, their tanks empty of any empathy or ability to better the lives of their country‚Äôs citizenry."

content.html: Really clear to me that the new web of fediverse + wasm + tailscale is moving very quickly towards something pretty amazing. As much promise as all the hype of ‚ÄúWeb3‚Äù, but open, interoperable, and no ties to crypto scams. A lot of incredible things are going to be built across this surface area in the next few years.
content.value: Really clear to me that the new web of fediverse + wasm + tailscale is moving very quickly towards something pretty amazing. As much promise as all the hype of ‚ÄúWeb3‚Äù, but open, interoperable, and no ties to crypto scams. A lot of incredible things are going to be built across this surface area in the next few years.

content.html:
Price of Idly, Dose, Vade, Coffee in Bangalore in 2022

https://thejeshgn.com/2023/01/19/idvc-2022-final-stats/

  • There was a total of 44 survey submissions.
  • The cheapest coffee costs Rs.10, and the median coffee price is Rs.15. The most expensive coffee costs Rs.41.
  • The most affordable plate of Idlies costs Rs.20, and the median price is Rs. 30
  • Dose costs Rs. 55 (median), the cheapest is 40, and the most expensive one is 113
  • Vada costs Rs. 25 (median), the cheapest is 15, and the most expensive one is 56.
content.value:
Price of Idly, Dose, Vade, Coffee in Bangalore in 2022
https://thejeshgn.com/2023/01/19/idvc-2022-final-stats/

There was a total of 44 survey submissions.
The cheapest coffee costs Rs.10, and the median coffee price is Rs.15. The most expensive coffee costs Rs.41.
The most affordable plate of Idlies costs Rs.20, and the median price is Rs. 30
Dose costs Rs. 55 (median), the cheapest is 40, and the most expensive one is 113
Vada costs Rs. 25 (median), the cheapest is 15, and the most expensive one is 56.

content.html:
Nagarathna Memorial Grant ‚Äì 2023 Open for Applications

2023 is going to be our sixth edition of NMG. Yes, we have already completed five years, and some of the grantees have done some fantastic work. I have taken up the task of collating stories of those outstanding grantees and their work. Maybe we all get to read it sometime this year, but I digress. The 2023 grant application is open. Remember, nothing is out of scope. Apply, Share.

https://thejeshgn.com/2023/01/16/nagarathna-memorial-grant-2023-open-for-applications/

content.html: I spent WAAAAAY too much time making this.
content.value: I spent WAAAAAY too much time making this.

photo.alt: A scatter plot comparing the sizes of "Smartphone Screens" to "How Far My Thumb Can Reach". From 2007-2010, the two were roughly the same size. With several years of sustained growth (roughly linear), smartphone screens in 2022 are now about 2 times bigger than they used to be. During that period, my thumb did not grow any larger.

content.html:
#Blog : Weekly Notes 02/2023

One big rule we follow at Peppo team is ‚Äì Be Nice to each other and everyone with whom you work. It makes a lot of difference. If you look at DataMeet‚Äôs code of conduct.¬†It‚Äôs the first rule. I sincerely believe in it and take it wherever I go. We can‚Äôt build organizations or teams without being nice to each other. When I see broken teams, most often than not, this is the rule that would have made a difference. Whats your one rule while working in a team?

https://thejeshgn.com/2023/01/13/weekly-notes-02-2023/
